source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(LastModifytime) as NewWatermarkvalue from data_source_table

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from data_source_table where LastModifytime > '@{activity('Lookup1').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and LastModifytime <= '@{activity('Lookup2').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 
data_source_table1.PersonID,
data_source_table1.Name,
data_source_table1.Age
from data_source_table1
SELECT  table_schema, table_name FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE table_type = 'base table' and table_schema='SalesLT'
SELECT  table_schema, table_name FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE table_type = 'base table' and table_schema='SalesLT'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select 
data_source_table1.PersonID,
data_source_table1.Name,
data_source_table1.Age,
CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION,
 SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from data_source_table1 
 RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES data_source_table1, @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on data_source_table1.PersonID = CT.PersonID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

schema.name: Sno	Date	Time	State/UnionTerritory	ConfirmedIndianNational	ConfirmedForeignNational	Cured	Deaths	Confirmed

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Sno as string,
		Date as string,
		Time as string,
		{State/UnionTerritory} as string,
		ConfirmedIndianNational as string,
		ConfirmedForeignNational as string,
		Cured as string,
		Deaths as string,
		Confirmed as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> covid19source
covid19source select(mapColumn(
		Sno,
		Date,
		{State/UnionTerritory},
		Cured,
		Deaths,
		Confirmed
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		Sno as string,
		Date as string,
		Time as string,
		{State/UnionTerritory} as string,
		ConfirmedIndianNational as string,
		ConfirmedForeignNational as string,
		Cured as string,
		Deaths as string,
		Confirmed as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> covid19source
covid19source select(mapColumn(
		Sno,
		Date,
		{State/UnionTerritory},
		Cured,
		Deaths,
		Confirmed
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
